text: I'm going bike camping for the first time next weekend, and I seek to rent a trailer. Anyone know of places in town that rent Bob or other 1-wheel trailers? Any other bike camping recommendations/stories? :slightly_smiling_face:
I’m afraid I don’t have any useful advice or stories, but that sounds so awesome!
I have this hazy memory that Next Adventure might? Not on their site, but I swear I saw trailers for rent when I was in last.

attachments.title: Biketown contract forces users to waive their legal rights - unless they act quickly - BikePortland.org
attachments.text: If you don't opt out, say goodbye to your chances of winning a future legal claim.
